query: SELECT id, case_number, category, client_name, client_email, client_phone, description, created_at FROM cases WHERE client_name LIKE '%Jamario%' OR client_name LIKE '%Ford%' OR client_email LIKE '%jamario%' OR client_email LIKE '%ford%' LIMIT 10;
